titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to adjust the limits on expensing of certain depreciable business assets.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/16/2013--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase, for taxable years beginning after 2013: (1) the limitation on the amount of the expensing allowance for depreciable business assets from $25,000 to $200,000, and (2) the threshold amount over which such expensing allowance is reduced from $200,000 to $800,000.
